use.flag: Enables the free OpenGFX graphics package for use in OpenTTD. With this there is no need for graphics from the Transport Tycoon Deluxe disc.
Enables the free OpenSFX sound package for use in OpenTTD. With this there is no need for sounds from the Transport Tycoon Deluxe disc.
Enables the free OpenMSX music set for use in OpenTTD.
Enables LZO compression for savegames. This is not needed, and only affects your ability to load extremely old savegames. (versions before 0.2)
Build only the openttd server, and not the client.
